org.jgum.category

Class Categorization<T extends Category>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgum.category.Categorization<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NamedCategorization, TypeCategorization

    public class Categorization<T extends Category>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A set of categories with a hierarchical organization. A categorization is defined by a root and two linearization functions (bottom-up and top-down). If no specified, the default bottom-up linearization function is a pre-order search, with a keep-last redundancy check policy. If no specified, the default top-down linearization function is a breadth-first search, with a keep-first redundancy check policy.
    Author:
    sergioc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Creates a categorization with the given linearization functions.
